title: Healthy Quinoa Salad
description: A refreshing and protein-packed quinoa salad with fresh vegetables and a tangy lemon dressing.
instructions: Bring water to boil add quinoa reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes
Mix quinoa with vegetables in a large bowl
Whisk olive oil and lemon juice for dressing
Pour dressing over salad and toss
Top with feta cheese and serve

title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon
description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet with a zesty lemon butter sauce and fresh herbs.
instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper
Melt butter with garlic and lemon juice

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description: Colorful and nutritious bowl packed with roasted vegetables quinoa and tahini dressing.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package directions
Roast sweet potato and chickpeas at 200Â°C for 25 minutes
Prepare tahini dressing with lemon juice
Arrange all ingredients in a bowl

title: Chicken Teriyaki Stir-fry
description: Quick and delicious Asian-inspired stir-fry with tender chicken and colorful vegetables.
instructions: Marinate chicken in soy sauce honey and ginger for 10 minutes
Add vegetables and cook for 5 minutes

title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
description: Fresh and vibrant pasta salad with Mediterranean flavors perfect for summer gatherings.
instructions: Drain and cool under cold water
Mix all ingredients in large bowl
Whisk olive oil and vinegar for dressing

title: Avocado Toast Deluxe
description: Elevated avocado toast with poached eggs cherry tomatoes and microgreens.
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice salt and pepper

title: Spinach and Feta Omelette
description: Fluffy omelette filled with fresh spinach and creamy feta cheese.
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper
Add spinach and feta on one half
Fold omelette when eggs are almost set

title: Thai Green Curry
description: Aromatic and spicy Thai green curry with vegetables and coconut milk.
instructions: Heat curry paste in large pot
Add coconut milk and bring to simmer
Cook for 15 minutes until vegetables are tender
Add fish sauce and lime juice

title: Roasted Vegetable Medley
description: Colorful array of seasonal vegetables roasted to perfection with herbs.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into similar sizes
Toss with olive oil and herbs
Serve hot or at room temperature

title: Protein Power Smoothie Bowl
description: Thick and creamy smoothie bowl loaded with protein and topped with fresh fruits.
instructions: Blend banana berries protein powder yogurt and milk until thick
Top with granola and chia seeds

title: Baked Sweet Potato Fries
description: Crispy baked sweet potato fries seasoned with paprika and herbs.
instructions: Spread on baking sheet in single layer
Fries should be golden and crispy

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: Layered parfait with creamy Greek yogurt fresh berries and crunchy granola.
instructions: Layer yogurt in bottom of glass

title: Cauliflower Rice Bowl
description: Low-carb cauliflower rice bowl with vegetables and Asian-inspired flavors.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in large pan
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds

title: Lentil Soup with Herbs
description: Hearty and nutritious lentil soup with aromatic herbs and vegetables.
instructions: SautÃ© onion carrots and celery until soft
Add garlic and spices cook for 1 minute
Bring to boil then reduce heat
Simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are tender

title: Zucchini Noodles Primavera
description: Light and refreshing zucchini noodles with colorful vegetables and pesto.
instructions: Heat olive oil in large pan
SautÃ© cherry tomatoes and peas for 3 minutes
Cook for 2-3 minutes until just tender
Top with pine nuts and parmesan

title: Chickpea Curry
description: Creamy and flavorful chickpea curry with coconut milk and warm spices.
instructions: Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Garnish with cilantro serve over rice

title: Baked Cod with Vegetables
description: Tender baked cod with a medley of colorful roasted vegetables.
instructions: Place cod and vegetables on baking sheet
Season with salt pepper and thyme

title: Quinoa Stuffed Peppers
description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with quinoa black beans and melted cheese.
instructions: Mix quinoa beans corn and cumin

title: Asian Tofu Salad
description: Crispy tofu on a bed of fresh greens with tangy Asian dressing.
instructions: Pan-fry tofu until golden and crispy
Whisk soy sauce vinegar and sesame oil

title: Berry Overnight Oats
description: Make-ahead overnight oats with berries and creamy almond butter.
instructions: Combine oats milk yogurt and chia seeds in jar
In morning top with berries and almond butter
Enjoy cold or heat if preferred

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian risotto with mixed mushrooms and parmesan cheese.
instructions: SautÃ© mushrooms until golden set aside
Add stock one ladle at a time stirring constantly
Continue until rice is creamy and al dente

title: Turkey Meatballs
description: Lean turkey meatballs with herbs served with marinara sauce.
instructions: Mix turkey breadcrumbs egg garlic parmesan and basil
Serve meatballs with sauce over pasta

title: Caprese Salad
description: Classic Italian salad with fresh mozzarella tomatoes and basil.
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on plate
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic

title: Egg White Frittata
description: Light and protein-rich egg white frittata with vegetables.
instructions: Whisk egg whites with salt and pepper

title: Shrimp Tacos
description: Spicy grilled shrimp tacos with cabbage slaw and lime crema.
instructions: Season shrimp with chili powder and cumin
Grill shrimp for 2-3 minutes per side
Mix sour cream with lime juice for crema
Toss cabbage with lime and cilantro
Assemble tacos with shrimp slaw and crema

title: Kale Caesar Salad
description: Healthy twist on Caesar salad with nutrient-rich kale.
instructions: Remove kale stems and chop leaves
Massage kale with lemon juice for 2 minutes
Add Caesar dressing and toss well

title: Baked Chicken Breast
description: Simple and juicy baked chicken breast with herbs and garlic.
instructions: Mix olive oil garlic paprika and herbs

title: Veggie Sushi Rolls
description: Homemade vegetarian sushi rolls with cucumber avocado and carrot.
instructions: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar
Let rice cool to room temperature
Spread rice evenly leaving 1 inch at top
Serve with soy sauce wasabi and ginger

title: Black Bean Burgers
description: Hearty plant-based burgers made with black beans and spices.
instructions: Mash black beans leaving some chunks
Mix beans breadcrumbs onion garlic and spices
Cook in skillet 5 minutes per side

title: Protein Pancakes
description: Fluffy high-protein pancakes perfect for post-workout breakfast.
instructions: Blend oats eggs banana protein powder milk and baking powder
Heat non-stick pan over medium heat
Cook until bubbles form flip and cook 2 more minutes

title: Beef Stir-Fry with Broccoli
description: Quick Asian-style beef and broccoli stir-fry with savory sauce.
instructions: Marinate beef in soy sauce and cornstarch
Add beef broccoli and oyster sauce
Serve over rice with sesame seeds

title: Butternut Squash Soup
description: Creamy and comforting butternut squash soup with warming spices.

title: Tuna Poke Bowl
description: Fresh Hawaiian-style poke bowl with sushi-grade tuna and vegetables.
instructions: Cook sushi rice according to package
Marinate tuna in soy sauce and sesame oil
Arrange tuna avocado cucumber and edamame

title: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Classic Italian eggplant parmesan with layers of cheese and marinara.
instructions: Salt eggplant slices let sit 30 minutes
Layer marinara eggplant and cheese in baking dish

title: Mango Smoothie
description: Tropical mango smoothie with yogurt and a hint of lime.

title: Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked BBQ pulled pork with tangy coleslaw on a bun.

title: Falafel Wrap
description: Crispy falafel in pita with tahini sauce and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Pulse chickpeas onion herbs garlic and spices in food processor

title: Chocolate Protein Shake
description: Rich chocolate protein shake perfect for post-workout recovery.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic homemade Margherita pizza with fresh mozzarella and basil.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Seasoned ground beef tacos with all the classic toppings.
instructions: Top with lettuce tomatoes and cheese

title: Green Detox Smoothie
description: Nutrient-packed green smoothie with spinach kale and fruits.

title: Lamb Chops with Mint
description: Perfectly grilled lamb chops with fresh mint sauce.
instructions: Make mint sauce with mint garlic lemon and oil
Season lamb chops with salt pepper and rosemary
Let rest at room temperature 30 minutes
Grill or pan-sear 4-5 minutes per side

title: Vegetable Curry
description: Aromatic mixed vegetable curry with Indian spices and coconut milk.

title: Cobb Salad
description: Classic American Cobb salad with rows of toppings.
instructions: Chop lettuce and arrange on platter

title: Chocolate Chip Protein Muffins
description: Healthy protein-packed muffins with chocolate chips.

title: Fish and Chips
description: Classic British fish and chips with crispy batter.
instructions: Make batter with flour beer and baking powder
Serve fish and chips with vinegar and tartar sauce

title: Pad Thai
description: Authentic Thai stir-fried noodles with chicken and peanuts.
instructions: Top with peanuts and green onions

title: Acai Bowl
description: Refreshing acai bowl topped with fresh fruits and granola.
instructions: Blend acai banana berries and milk until thick
Top with granola and fresh fruit

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: Comforting homemade chicken noodle soup perfect for cold days.
instructions: Simmer chicken in broth until cooked
Add noodles and cook until tender

title: Banana Bread
description: Moist and delicious banana bread perfect for breakfast or snack.
instructions: Stir in sugar egg and vanilla
Sprinkle baking soda and salt over mixture
Add flour and mix until just combined
